english.segment2: Praise to You God. Your love is everlasting. Praises to You. Your greatness never ends. Be lifted up let Your glory fill the earth. Praise to You God praises to You
english.segment4: Awake my soul and sing. Come lift my eyes to see how wonderful. How magnificent You are
english.segment6: Oh nations hear Your voices. Lifting hearts as one. To the great I Am. To the Holy One the Lord
english.segment8: All glory in the highest. All honor to You
